page.title: 09TRADE II
page.content: The{Precinct}is important because people use it to shop in, rather than go to town, and to meet other people. There are two rows of shops. On one side there is a bank, a video shop, a newsagent and sweet shop, a supermarket, a beauty salon, a clothes shop, a Post Office and a betting shop. On the other side there is a chip shop, a carpet store, a chemist, an optician, a grocer's shop and a pub. Also there is a Methodist Church. Many people meet and talk for ages in the Precinct. Teenagers play on their skateboards, roller skates and their bikes, which drives people mad, especially old people.
